Gruppo Campari, founded in 1860, is a leading player in the global branded beverage industry with a portfolio counting more than 50 premium and super premium brands, that spans three main segments: spirits, wines and soft drinks.
The Group is today the 6th largest player worldwide in the premium spirits industry, and our products are marketed and distributed in more than 190 countries in the world.
